detail_desc: Tulle skirt with appliqués and a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Dress in mesh and lace with a lace-covered bodice, narrow shoulder straps that cross and button at the back, a seam at the waist and skirt in several layers of tulle. Lined.
Imitation suede sandals with a decorative bow at the front and an elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in crocheted lace made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist, decorative bow at the front and side pockets. Jersey lining.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Shorts in an airy linen and viscose blend with a high waist with pleats and a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners. Concealed pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short off-the-shoulder dress in soft twill made from Tencel™ lyocell with elastication and a wide frill trim at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 90x110 cm.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and side pockets.
Dress in soft lace with an elasticated, flounced neckline and seam at the waist. Lined.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Long-sleeved blouse in a plumeti cotton weave with a boat neck and buttons down the front. Gently tailored bodice and puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Fabric cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable tab at the back.
Wide, slightly boxy-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch cotton twill with an off-centre zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Fake pockets with a zip, and a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Trousers in superstretch twill with a high waist with concealed elastication, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Trousers in sturdy jersey with contrasting colour seams, a regular waist, zip fly and covered button, and slim, flared legs with sewn-in creases.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 6 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Cargo shorts in cotton twill with worn details, a button fly, side pockets, flap back pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and flap leg pockets with a press-stud.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with a wide foldover at the top, wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sandals in imitation leather with glittery straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Joggers in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Jersey fancy dress cape with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck and a hood with appliqués. Unlined.
Short lace dress with short lace sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Partly lined in jersey.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles,and soft soles in imitation leather with anti-slip protectors.
Stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 3.7 cm.
Waistcoat in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt front pockets.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Frill-trimmed seams and covered buttons at the front and wide smocking at the back of the hem.
Long knitted jumper in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover polo neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details with patches on the inside and an adjustable elasticated waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Long dress in a sturdy linen and silk weave with a deep V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Fitted bodice, an asymmetric seam under the bust and a low-cut back. Wide skirt with pleats for extra width and a concealed zip in the back. Recycled polyester lining.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in an airy patterned weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and slim legs.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in soft cotton denim with a gently tapered waist. Collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless top in seersucker with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a bow.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with decorative buttons at the front, an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Trainers in imitation leather with a low shaft with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and TPR (thermoplastic rubber) soles.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.
Bikini briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims. Mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short, straight-cut off-the-shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Slim-fit, bootcut jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short shorts in woven fabric in a relaxed fit with an elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, side pockets in the side seams, a welt back pocket and a zip and button at the front.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, circular dress in woven fabric with wide straps that cross at the front and tie at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at one side. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details. Low waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short jacket in felted fabric containing some wool with a pile-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs, and adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides. Pile lining.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair.
Shortie briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

Longer, straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, welt front pockets, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Metal rings in various designs.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Double-breasted coat in soft fabric with wide shawl lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. One inner pocket, a tab at the back and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short cap sleeves, a chest pocket with glitter and appliqués, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and slim legs.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud and a zipped sleeve pocket. Lined.
Microfibre bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Tunic in an airy weave with an opening with narrow ties at the top, dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips and a flare to the hem.
Imitation leather sandals with two adjustable straps at the front with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in slightly stretchy, sturdy satin with an elasticated waist, zip and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Tapered legs with decorative seams and a slit at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Knee-length dress in airy crêpe with a V-shaped opening and pleated section at the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
